title: The true idea of Jansenisme both historick and dogmatick. By T. G.
author: Gale, Theophilus, 1628-1678.
publisher: printed for E. Calvert, at the west end of St. Pauls, and G. Widdows at the Maiden-Head in Aldersgate-Street,
notes: Part I has running title: The historick idea of Jansenisme.
Part II has running title and caption title (p. 101): The dogmatick idea of Jansenisme.
Copy tightly bound with some loss of text.
Reproduction of the original in Trinity College Library, Cambridge University, Cambridge, England.
